stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements most accurately describes the beat and subdivisions of the beat in the accompanying piano part?

features.html: The following question is based on the excerpt below, which is for soprano and piano.

choicesHtml: Three beats per measure with a simple subdivision of the beat
Three beats per measure with a compound subdivision of the beat
Four beats per measure with a simple subdivision of the beat
Four beats per measure with a compound subdivision of the beat
